---
--- Generated by lvyuqiang
--- File name : hash_table.lua.txt
--- DateTime : 2021/04/16
--- Description : table hash部分静态方法
---

local h_table = {}

---获取table长度
---@public
---@param list table table
---@return number
function h_table.count(list)
    if list == nil then
        return 0
    end

    local count = 0
    for _, _ in pairs(list) do
        count = count + 1
    end
    return count
end

---移除table中的元素
---@public
---@param list table table
---@param value any 元素
---@return boolean
function h_table.remove(list, value)
    if list == nil or value == nil then
        return false
    end

    local removed = false
    for k, v in pairs(list) do
        if v == value then
            list[k] = nil
            removed = true
        end
    end
    return removed
end

---清理table
---@public
---@param list table table
---@return void
function h_table.clear(list)
    if list == nil then
        return
    end

    for k, _ in pairs(list) do
        list[k] = nil
    end
end

---table是否包含元素
---@public
---@param list table table
---@param value any value
---@return boolean
function h_table.contains(list, value)
    if list == nil or value == nil then
        return false
    end

    for _, v in pairs(list) do
        if v == value then
            return true
        end
    end
    return false
end

hash_table = h_table
